GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url='https://beta.ustreamix.com/[makelist.param1]'): import re, requests hdr = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 9_2 like Mac OS X)'} html = requests.get(url,headers=hdr).text uip = re.findall("x_first_ip = '(.*?)'",html,re.DOTALL)[0] ohtm = eval(re.findall('Obfuscator.*?var.*?(\[.*?\])',html,re.DOTALL)[0]) oval = int(re.findall('replace.*?- (\d*)',html)[0]) phtml = '' for oht in ohtm: phtml += chr(int(re.findall('\D*(\d*)',oht.decode('base64'))[0]) - oval) strurl = re.findall("var stream = '(.*?)'",phtml)[0] hdr['Referer'] = url tokpg = requests.get('https://mir.hulkfiles.com/stats.php?p=%s'%uip,headers=hdr).text token = re.findall('jdtk="(.*?)"',tokpg)[0] return strurl+token JHGMASTER LISTAS IPTV DAILY
